name: King of the Summit
desc4: When the equipper is a Stun character and uses an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, increases CRIT DMG of all squad members by 15%, and when the equipper's CRIT Rate is more than or equal to 50%, further increases CRIT DMG by 15%, lasting 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
story: This collaboration theme between sports brand True Martial and Yunkui Summit was reportedly composed by a renowned direct disciple of Yunkui Summit, depicting the legend of an awe-inspiring King of the Summit.
